long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Efficiently remove Facebook friends in bulk and track removal statistics.
Transform your FB friend management with Mass Friends Remover.

Declutter your Facebook friends list effortlessly with Mass Friends Remover. Designed for efficient bulk friend removal, our tool helps you streamline your social network effectively while maintaining full control.

🚀 Key Features
✓ Mass Friend Removal: Easily remove multiple friends with a single action.
✓ Filtered Removal: Target friends by type: Female, Male or Deactivated Accounts
✓ Custom Daily Limits: Set a daily removal limit to ensure smooth operations within FB's limits.
✓ FB IDs & Profile URLs: Remove friends directly by FB IDs or profile URLs for precision.
✓ History Log: Track and review all removed friends.
✓ Control Operations: Pause, resume, or stop the removal process anytime for greater flexibility.

Why Choose Mass Friends Remover?
🚀 Time-Saving: Remove unwanted connections with one click—no more manual effort.
💡 User-Friendly: An intuitive interface makes it accessible to everyone.
⚙️ Highly Customizable: Tailor settings to suit your specific needs.
🔐 Privacy-First Approach: All processes happen locally, ensuring your data remains secure.

# Perfect for:
👥 Social media enthusiasts
💼 Business networkers
🌐 Community builders
🔍 Anyone looking to remove Facebook friends in bulk

How to Use Mass Friends Remover
1. Open the extension and click the *Open the App* button.
2. Select removal criteria: type (Female/Male/Deactivated), IDs, or URLs.
3. Customize daily removal limits if needed.
4. Begin the removal process and manage it with *Pause*, *Resume*, or *Stop* as required.

📬 FAQ:
If you have trouble, describe the issue and send a screenshot to our support team for troubleshooting assistance.

Instagram Permission Description:
This extension utilizes the GraphQL API to fetch data for each provided user ID, including details like name, profile picture, and profile link. To enable seamless operation of the GraphQL API, the extension requires authorization from https://instagram.com to process GraphQL interface requests.

In the popup, we offer these extra features:
Relevant-Ext: Brief recommendations and introductions to related extensions.

🔐 Data Privacy
Your data security is our top priority. All actions take place on your device, ensuring complete privacy.

⭐ About Pro
Mass Friends Remover offers basic features for free, including a free quota. Upgrade to Pro for unlimited requests and maximize your productivity!

📥 Streamline your Facebook management today—download Mass Friends Remover now!
